scripts.deploy:main: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name aimainmap --branch main
scripts.deploy:beta: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name aimainmap --branch beta
scripts.deploy:alpha: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name aimainmap --branch alpha
scripts.ship:main: npm run deploy:main && git push origin main
scripts.ship:beta: npm run deploy:beta && git push origin beta
scripts.ship:alpha: npm run deploy:alpha && git push origin alpha
